lead_paragraph: A new system of guidance unveiled on Monday by the Homeland Security Department is intended to reduce programming errors that make Web sites susceptible to hacking.

headline.seo: U.S. Guidelines Aim to Bolster Software Security
headline.main: U.S. Guidelines Aim to Bolster Software Security
headline.print_headline: U.S. Guidelines Aim to Bolster Software Security
